snippet: Dozens of defectors from North Korea have signed up for a free surgery program, including a woman whose face was scarred in a factory accident and a man who cannot breathe through his nose.
abstract: New program in South Korea offers free plastic surgery to defectors from North Korea who have been scarred by accidents, assaults and prior illnesses in effort to help people regain their looks and self-esteem.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of defectors from North Korea have signed up for a free surgery program, including a woman whose face was scarred in a factory accident and a man who cannot breathe through his nose.

headline.print_headline: Erasing Physical Signs of North Korea’s Scars
headline.main: South Korean Plastic Surgeons Help Northern Defectors Erase Their Scars
